The Display Names used by the structured data should match the Display Name (Preferred Name) within the Terminology
Allergies Concern observation effective times reflect the appropriate allergy concern status
Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text

referenceErrors.description: A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Indication2 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).

A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Procedure Activity Procedure2 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14:2014-06-09. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).

A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Mental Status Observation (V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74:2015-08-01. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).

referenceErrors.description: The node '@unit' does not exist at the expected path /ClinicalDocument[1]/component[1]/structuredBody[1]/component[9]/section[1]/entry[4]/organizer[1]/component[1]/observation[1]/value[1] but is required as per the specification: If Observation/value is a physical quantity (xsi:type="PQ"), the unit of measure SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-31484).
